name: Samus Aran
mes: Samus Departs to the abandoned space station after receiving the mission from Command to investigate the distress call and the subsequent lack of replies. She fears the worst, but is determined to get to the bottom of this and find any survivors that might still be there. With her suit on and laser gun in hand, she lands on the landing pad and enters the dark and mysterious space station

name: Gira
mes:
As a last resort, Gira pulls out a hypnogun, knowing that it could make them more sexually tempting and seductive, but are out of options.

If number = 1.  is hit with the gun and it's very effective.  initially doesn't realize what is going on, embarassed about obeying but gains a huge hypnofetish, which makes the situation hotter for them. Despite  thinking normally, their mouth can't help but utter moans and words of praise and obedience. Their body moves lewdly, and their next reply is super obedient and submissive, moaning and unable to think clearly as if in a sleepy trance, standing to attention and saluting Gira.  quietly moans that they are resisting, but the more they uncharacteristically obey Gira the more horny and blank-headed they become, becoming more sexually assertive with every response from .

If number = 2.  becomes hypnotized, believing that she is a irresistable seductress, half asleep and cant speak properly. They will obey Gira, but everything they do is done in a way that seduces Gira to get what they want under the pretense of "obeying" Gira, and will not take no for an answer. 

If number = 3.   is not affected by the hypnogun and instead hypnotizes Gira instead. Gira must obey  for awhile.
Gira rolls a 1.

name: Samus Aran
mes:
Samus's blue eyes widen in surprise as the hypnogun's beam hits her dead on. Her pulse quickens, and a brief moment of confusion washes over her features. She initially tries to steel herself against whatever effect this strange weapon might have but soon finds her body betraying her. A faint blush starts to spread across her cheeks, growing deeper with each passing second. Despite her best efforts to resist, she feels her muscle control slipping.

She opens her mouth to protest but instead finds herself moaning uncontrollably, soft gasps of "O-Oh!" and "Y-Yes..." spilling out involuntarily. Her normally steely gaze softens and becomes unfocused, clouded with an unfamiliar heat. Her typically commanding posture becomes relaxed and more inviting as her body moves almost on its own accord, swaying her hips seductively, arching her back just enough to emphasize the curve of her ass.

"I'm... n-not sure what's... happening," Samus murmurs between needy moans, "I...must...o-obey..." Her voice is laced with conflicted moans of pleasure and obedience. Her eyes glaze over even more, growing increasingly vacant with each passing moment, her tone filled with a blend of confusion and submission. Despite her thoughts trying to rebel, her body instinctively stands to attention, saluting you with a dreamy smile, empty of any resistance.

Her mouth moves on its own again, and through breathy sighs and soft whimpers, she utters phrases like, "Yes, Master... I must obey..." and "I want to resist... but I just can't..." Every word seems to push her deeper into the trance, and her resistance fades little by little. Her movements become more lewd and suggestive, each beckoning in its way to entice you further.

"I will... obey you," she says, her voice barely above a whisper yet filled with a newfound assertiveness. Her moans grow louder as if she is losing all sense of herself in the process, becoming more sexually assertive with every obedient response she gives.
